<title level="1" right="Rules">[Constant Abilities](/Rules.aspx?ID=3137)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 219 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some magic items have abilities that always function. PCs don't have to use any actions to do anything special (beyond wearing and investing a worn item or wielding a held item) to make these abilities work. For example, an _[everlight crystal](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3021)_ always sheds light, and a _[flaming weapon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2838)_ deals fire damage every time it deals damage.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
